commandName.label: Command Name
commandName.tooltip: Name of the command as it will be used in chat

defaultMessage.value: Everyone go check out $user over at their channel! $channel
defaultMessage.label: Default Message
defaultMessage.tooltip: The default shoutout message to be displayed

cooldown.label: Global Cooldown in seconds
cooldown.tooltip: How long users must wait before using the command (in seconds)

permission.label: Permission Level
permission.tooltip: Specify the user permission level required to use this command
